invertedControls: bind s +forward; bind d +moveleft; bind a +moveright; bind w +back;-back;-forward;-moveright;-moveleft;
reset: firstperson; thirdperson_mayamode 0; thirdperson_screenspace 0; host_timescale 1; sp_difficulty 0; m_invert_pitch 0; sv_gravity 750; cl_fovScale 1.42003; bind w +forward; bind a +moveleft; bind d +moveright; bind s +back;-back;-forward;-moveright;-moveleft;
